content: The fishy taste of avocado is almost non-existent, and it's much smoother than I expected! It's a must-have after my workout. I will definitely repurchase this again. The packaging was also neat.
It's a cold-pressed juice, so it's fresh and excellent. However, I deducted one star because there's a very slight hint of the characteristic earthy smell of carrots.
The combination of berries and oats is filling and delicious. It's the best substitute for breakfast. The quantity is generous too.
The refreshing taste of kiwi bursts through, and the carbonation is just right. It's perfect for drinking in the summer. So cool!
I had high hopes, but I was disappointed that the mango flavor was weaker than expected. Still, I trust the ingredients.
I'm satisfied because it feels like the cherry is richly concentrated. I drink it consistently every day and feel energized.
The sweetness is strong, which is great when I crave something sweet. I deducted one star because the delivery was one day late.
It's much richer and more delicious than other tomato juices. The best for breakfast substitute! Drink it cold.
I bought it based on a friend's recommendation and I'm satisfied.
It's great for everyday drinking. However, the oat powder tends to clump slightly when mixing.
I love the exotic taste of papaya. My child prefers this over regular juice. Thank you for making a product I can safely give to my child.
I like that it keeps me feeling full for a long time. It's become easier to wake up in the morning. Perfect for busy days.
It's perfect for beginners who are just starting with cold-pressed juice. It's easy to digest and not burdensome.
I always keep a stock of this in the refrigerator. I love that the authentic taste of tomato is alive. Highly recommend.
I'm not sure about the big effects yet. I think I need to consume it consistently for at least a month. The taste is acceptable.
It's delicious when mixed with milk. It's also great as a meal replacement. The color is pretty too.
The sparkling is not too strong, so it goes down smoothly. The taste is rich and refreshing. Highly recommend.
It's alright. However, the price is slightly higher compared to the product from another brand I used to take.
This is the cleanest-tasting tropical fruit juice! I've finally settled on this one. Please sell it in a larger capacity.
I dislike artificial sweetness, but this has a clean and nutty sweetness. I've repurchased it!
